items.question: What is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum and what does it do?
items.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a brightening facial serum with 10% Vitamin C concentration. It helps brighten your complexion and effectively fades dark spots, giving your skin a healthy, radiant glow. The formula also contains Hyaluronic Acid for added hydration.

items.question: Is this serum suitable for my skin type?
items.answer: This serum is specially formulated for oily and combination skin types. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue, making it perfect for those with excess oil production or mixed skin concerns.

items.question: How do I use the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
items.answer: Apply 2-3 drops of the serum to clean, dry skin in the morning. Gently pat it into your face and neck, then follow with your regular moisturizer and sunscreen. Sunscreen is especially important when using Vitamin C products.

items.question: Can I use this serum every day?
items.answer: Yes, the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is designed for daily morning use. Consistent daily application will give you the best results in brightening your skin and fading dark spots over time.

items.question: Will this serum cause any irritation or side effects?
items.answer: Most users tolerate the serum well. However, if you have sensitive skin, you may experience mild tingling during the first few applications. This is normal and usually subsides as your skin adjusts. If irritation persists, reduce usage frequency or discontinue use.

items.question: What are the key ingredients in this serum?
items.answer: The star ingredients are 10% Vitamin C for brightening and dark spot reduction, and Hyaluronic Acid for deep hydration. This powerful combination works together to improve skin tone while keeping your skin moisturized and plump.

items.question: How long does it take to see results?
items.answer: While individual results may vary, most users notice a brighter complexion within 2-3 weeks of consistent use. For significant improvement in dark spots and overall skin tone, continue using the serum daily for 6-8 weeks.

items.question: Do I need to use sunscreen with this serum?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely! Sunscreen is essential when using Vitamin C serums. Apply the serum in the morning, follow with your moisturizer, and always finish with a broad-spectrum sunscreen. This protects your skin and maximizes the brightening benefits.

items.question: Can I use this serum with other skincare products?
items.answer: Yes, this serum works well in most skincare routines. Apply it to clean skin in the morning, then follow with your regular moisturizer and sunscreen. If you use other active ingredients, you may want to alternate days or consult with a dermatologist for the best routine.
